## Source: ossf-package-analysis (3fbb027ee575f4b88b31744f95f02d8261e9e7a7adc51c03ed5854875e7ac394)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'sap-autofixforcesource' @ 0.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
